title: Musk to meet with Twitter advertisers after ‘name & shame’ warning
description: The billionaire owner had threatened a “thermonuclear name & shame” campaign against advertisers that abandon the platform.

title: How to avoid falling for and spreading misinformation online
description: Breaking news moves fast online, and it can be difficult to tell what's real and what's purposefully misleading or fake. Here's how to sort through it all.

title: Facebook parent begins mass layoffs as tech industry slashes jobs
description: Mark Zuckerberg, CEO of Facebook parent Meta, announced more than 11,000 layoffs as the company seeks to cut back on expenses and transform its business model.

title: How a viral teen app became the center of a sex trafficking conspiracy
description: The app quickly took off with teens, until an unfounded rumor, repeated by police and TV, linked it to sex trafficking.

title: How Twitter’s contentious new fact-checking project really works
description: In private chats, a cadre of volunteers is shaping a new approach to policing misinformation — one Elon Musk has endorsed as he scales back on professional debunkings.
